name: In Stable (LD49)
description:
Balance your ever-growing pile of hay! But don't let it fall.

Move the pin Left and Right with A and D keys

Balance as many blocks as you can without dropping them!

Game made for LD49 by Evan Binder and Michael Meyer :)

Additional sound effects from https://www.zapsplat.com

We're not allowed to add new features to our submission, and also had to juggle homework & life this weekend, so please pretend that 

  • there is a game start screen
  • you have a game-over screen when you lose all your lives ;)
  • the bomb sound effect isn't to loud

thanks 😂
